thread.title: BRIEF-Party City Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.58

title: BRIEF-Party City Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.58
text: March 9, 2018 / 12:43 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Party City Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.58 Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - Party City Holdco Inc: * PARTY CITY ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.58 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $2.44 BILLION TO $2.49 BILLION * SEES 2018 BRAND COMPARABLE SALES GROWTH OF APPROXIMATELY 1% * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.83, REVENUE VIEW $2.46 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * PARTY CITY HOLDCO - QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $789.6 MILLION VERSUS $749.3 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $781.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
